INSERT INTO OAAS_ROLE_PRIVATE (
) VALUES
( #{item.rolePrivateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.privateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.empowerFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
